seller_notes: QR Code Link to This Post Only 11,087 miles! Clean title, no lien holder. Original owner, no smoking, no pets. More details, Carfax etc. at joseph63brenner at medclubmd com .This has been my weekend car. It’s always been garaged. 2021 Tesla Model S Long Range (21" Wheels) finished in Midnight Silver Metallic over a Black interior. Options: - Long Range -21" Arachnid Wheels -Midnight Silver Metallic -Yoke Steering Wheel -All Black Premium Interior with Ebony Décor -Autopilot -Pay-as-you-go Supercharging Stepping away from the insane world of 0-60 mph times, daily driving encompasses more than just savage launches. The seats are comfortable and supportive, and the ride smooth enough on the standard height-adjustable air suspension, making the Model S great over long distances. Two different settings allow you to choose heavy or light steering effort, the handling is crisp, and it's confident and almost tranquil on the highway. The steering is accurate and quick enough to make the S feel very agile, especially given it's size.  Technophiles will be in heaven and fans of modern minimalism adore the Model S's cabin, which comes standard with a giant infotainment screen that controls almost all of the vehicle's functions.

It has the most desirable Blue version Tesla released with 21" Turbine Wheels with newer tires. The plus option- performance this car has what people know as "ludicrous speed" on demand always in-gauged and a sporty suspension. Second owner and always adult driven. The battery still is in great shape with a full mile range at 100%. Full Air suspension with adjust ride height, premium sound system and an All Glass Roof/ sunroof. The rear facing jump seats completely fold down into a storage in the floor and can be flipped up if you need extra seats. These cars received extra reinforcement in the rear for safety and has been great for extra room for "smaller riders" like the back seat in the current "Y" model. Excellent car when Tesla was assembled with quality builds. I reluntantly am selling it since my family is growing and I did replace it with another Tesla but the SUV. No accidents with a clean title. Tesla's have the BEST of every car in it. Best ride comfort, sound system, seats, controls, electric car technology, and speed. name: 2022 Ford F150 Lightning Lariat Extended Range
seller_notes: QR Code Link to This Post Selling a gently used and always garaged 2022 Ford Lightning Lariat Extended Range, Iced Blue Silver. This is an amazing truck with power and performance.   The instant power and torque on a full size truck is an experience like no others.  The truck offers spacious interior and comfortable seating make it perfect for long drives and road trips. 2022 is the model year to buy as many of the features are no longer offered for the 2023 model year.  Including On Board Scale, heated steering wheel, modem, and truck bed camera I have tinted all the windows with Xpel ceramic tint.  Block 99% of UV and heat from the sun.  Extra comfortable during hot summer days when you only need to turn the AC on at low fan speed.  $1200 Has all the 2022 Ford Lightning Lariat extended range goodies and more: 511A package Ford C0-Pilot360 Active 2.0 Partitioned lockable storage in the back seat Tow Technology package On-board Scale w/ Smart hitch  — Estimate the weight of the load in your truck bed Twin Panel moonroof 20 inch alloy dark gray wheels All Terrain tires Liner floor mat Max Trailer tow package Bedliner If you are looking at this truck you probably know that it has bi-directional charging capabilities.  Meaning you can charge the truck and also use the truck to supply power for your home or anything that has an electric plug.   It comes with a mobile charger as well as a Ford Pro charger which I did not install.  This Pro charger, once installed, can charge the truck at 80 amps and supply power to your home in case of a power outage. We were lucky to have this truck during the storms this past winter season which knocked out power to our house for 2 days.  The truck was able to power 2 full size fridges, Starlink internet, and charging multiple electronics equipments (phones, iPads, laptops, batteries, etc) throughout the day.  The truck battery exceeded expectation and was extremely efficient as it used only 10% from supplying power to those things for 2 full days.  I could have gone on another 10+ days if needed.    It’s like having a big generator for your home, and you can also drive it.   The battery size on this truck is 131kwh.  If you were to secure a Tesla battery wall system with 131 kWh battery capacity, the cost would be in the upwards of $100k. Please serious buyers only please.  Clean title in hand for an easy transaction.  Please send me your name and number and I will call you to schedule a time to look at the truck.  Prove of funds or loans prior to meet up if you are serious about buying the truck. Thanks.

name: 2023 Rivian R1S Quad Motor Adventure Package
seller_notes: QR Code Link to This Post You're looking at a 2023 R1S Quad Motor 835 BHP in Forest Green exterior and Black Mountain + Dark Ash Wood interior in pristine condition. We received delivery in May after a 2 year long wait and have driven it sparingly for a short commute to work. As much as we enjoy driving it and would love to keep it, our priorities have changed and we've decided to sell. This is a rare opportunity to own and drive a car that does 0-60 in 3 seconds on road, can complete the Rubicon trail without any modifications and at the same time transport a family of 7 comfortably. All while being a head turner. I get asked about it by curious car enthusiasts all the time. The same config costs $97,195 if you order from Rivian today with a delivery date of late 2024. We've received the license plate and I have the title in hand ready for a quick, no hassle sale. Don't let this opportunity pass! If you're interested and serious, looking for immediate purchase, reach out by clicking reply on this post. Features: - Adventure Package - Quad-Motor AWD with 10 driving modes:    - All-Purpose, Snow, Tow, Sport, Conserve, All Terrain, Soft Sand, Rock Crawl, Rally, Drift - Forest Green exterior color - Black Mountain + Dark Ash Wood interior - Heated and Air Cooled vegan leather seats - 21" Road wheel and tire which offers the longest range - Massive 15 inch infotainment screen, 10.5 inch driver display screen - 1200 Watt Rivian Elevation audio system with 18 speakers - Third Row Seating - Towing capability: 7,700 lbs - Two 120V outlets to plug in your household appliances while camping - Adjustable air supsension which can electronically raise or lower 6.5 inches    - Camp mode which levels the car while on uneven terrain    - Kneel mode which automatically lowers the car to lowest height when stopped for easy entry/exit - Large battery pack with 330 miles of driving range - Included Rivian Level 2 Wall Charger unopened in original packaging - Free charging at Rivian fast chargers and RAN chargers available at national parks - Access to Tesla supercharger network will be available soon

name: 1973 Porsche 914 electric conversion
seller_notes: QR Code Link to This Post Up for sale is a running project, a lovely 1973 Porsche 914 that has been converted to electric power. Low mileage (39,998 miles!) and garaged in the Bay Area, it's very tough to find a 914 in this condition with little to no rust, very decent original interior and what looks like shiny original black paint.  Bolted to the nicely functioning transaxle and clutch is a massive General Electric DC motor from a 1970s Bradley GTE, known as the "rolls royce" of DC electric motors. This motor has a steel commutator and can take more rpm and abuse than others like it. There are two lithium A123 battery modules up front from Thunderstruck motors in Santa Rosa. Two new Thunderstruck battery chargers mounted above the motor can fill the battery from empty in two hours. A battery management system from Thunderstruck has also been installed. This drive system has been trouble free and enjoyable to drive. Think "set it and forget it" and not endless tinkering and trouble.  The previous owner converted the car in the 1990s, so the motor and curtis controller are from that era, and are of relatively low voltage. The 10kwh battery has much larger capacity than the original lead acid pack and much smaller (weighs about 200 pounds). It's currently running at 90 volts, so top speed is about 75 mph, but still plenty of fun low speed torque. I have another motor and controller I can include that would significantly increase top speed and more than double the power with some simple changes to the battery arrangement to double the voltage. It's current range is about 30 miles, depending on how you drive it.  I've enjoyed working on this car and it's been lovely to drive it around. The suspension and steering feel quite nice, thanks to the bilstein shocks, relatively low miles and all new vredestein tires. The gauge cluster was recently restored and brake master cylinder replaced.  It doesn't need a whole lot to be a solid driver. The front struts appear to rattle while driving, there's a small leak from the brake reservoir hose and most of the weatherstripping needs to be replaced to keep rain out of the car. Around $300 worth of rubber seals are included.  So fix a few things and drive it as is, or upgrade for relatively cheap. Replacing the battery in the frunk with four tesla modules or three VW id4 modules would double the range at the same battery weight and be relatively easy to do.  It's far simpler to work on than a modern ev and more fun to drive. If you are a serious buyer write me an email that indicates you read the whole ad and are serious about keeping it electric. Otherwise I may ignore it. Thank you for looking.

seller_notes: QR Code Link to This Post ‘Rehoming’ my fun little 2016 Volkswagen e-Golf  This is the all-electric version of VWs stalwart and beloved Golf/GTI.  (More pics coming soon) All the character for which Golfs are famous isn’t lost in the EV option.  Such a blast to drive you’ll make up errands just to take it out for an evening spin.  These cars are an excellent around-town vehicle for errands, short trips and would make a perfect beginner vehicle for a teen just learning to drive Max nominal range on a full charge is around 85 miles. No smog required. These cars are famously low-maintenance vehicles and don’t come with all the bugs and build-quality issues common to Tesla, Nissan Leaf and other EVs.  Never charged to 100% in order to preserve the battery.  Options include: front seat heaters, nav and bluetooth connectivity w Apple CarPlay, auto dimming rear view mirror, HID auto headlights, auto climate control, Keyless entry, rain sensing wipers, and back up camera. I’ve really enjoyed owning and driving this car but we just had a baby and I needed a bigger vehicle to haul around the stroller and all the other gear.  The cons of this car are as follows: Small battery means it doesn’t go too far on a charge. Good for commuter but not suited to road trips.  Anyone familiar with modern Golfs knows that they don’t have a ton of cargo space.  However - great car for those who just need a zippy ride for errands or keeping your teen from driving down to LA with their friends on a whim.   Vehicle will be delivered cleaned following VW dealer inspection.  Will only conduct sale at my credit union in San Francisco. Bank check, no cash.  Not interested in dealing with purveyors of spam or kickers of tires.  Available to show in Sausalito, Marin City, Mill Valley area.  Car will come with two portable chargers.
